posts.post_title: t206 Lot For Sale 33 Cards Decent SOLD SOLD
posts.post_content:
33 card t206 lot for sale.

A few tougher cards in lot:
Tom Jones, Larry Doyle (Throwing), Bob Hall, Doc Adkins, Frank Smith 
(White Cap), Ed Reulbach (Glove Showing). Hal Chase (Dark Cap).
$445 includes shipping. First come, first served!!
